title: Diversity and Inclusion
description:
As the world becomes increasingly globalized, the need to
understand the theory and practice of diversity and
inclusion becomes an imperative. This module introduces
students to fundamental concepts, theories and
frameworks related to diversity and inclusion. Students will
develop awareness about themselves and how they relate
to the world around them (especially as it relates to their
prejudices and biases). Students will also be exposed to
the issues of diversity and inclusion at the global, national,
and organisational level, and learn strategies to manage
that diversity
